QR Code Generator

Create Custom QR Codes for Free - Fast and Easy Online Tool

Generate QR codes for URLs, text, and more. Free online QR code generator.
Easily scan your generated QR code with any smartphone.
Customize your QR codes for text, URLs, and more.

How to use the QR Code Generator

  1. Enter the text or URL you want to convert into a QR code.
  2. Click the Generate QR Code button.
  3. Your QR code will be displayed below. You can scan it with any QR code reader.
